text: When “ Mom ” premiered in 2013, the mother - daughter duo of Christy and Bonnie Plunkett had been estranged for years after Bonnie ( Allison Janney ) had neglected her daughter throughout her childhood — lost for many years to her addiction — which was then a cycle Christy ( Anna Faris ) repeated.
